001package org.biopax.validator.utils;
002
003
004import org.apache.commons.text.StringEscapeUtils;
005import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
006import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
007import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
008import org.biopax.validator.api.ValidatorUtils;
009import org.biopax.validator.api.beans.*;
010import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Configurable;
011import org.springframework.context.MessageSource;
012import org.springframework.context.i18n.LocaleContextHolder;
013
014import java.util.Locale;
015
016/**
017 * Validation rules and errors utilities.
018 *
019 * This is injected into other beans, keeps several global settings and objects,
020 * e.g., marshaller, and also provides static service methods to register,
021 * merge, do OXM, and resolve validation errors to human-readable verbose messages.
022 *
023 * @author rodche
024 */
025@Configurable
026public class CoreUtils implements ValidatorUtils {
027  private static final Log logger = LogFactory.getLog(CoreUtils.class);
028  public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_ERRORS = 10000;
029
030  private Locale locale;
031  private MessageSource messageSource;
032  private int maxErrors;
033
034  public CoreUtils() {
035    this.maxErrors = DEFAULT_MAX_ERRORS;
036    this.locale = LocaleContextHolder.getLocale();
037  }
038
039  public void setMessageSource(MessageSource rulesMessageSource) {
040    this.messageSource = rulesMessageSource;
041  }
042  public MessageSource getMessageSource() {
043    return messageSource;
044  }
045
046  public void setLocale(Locale locale) {
047    this.locale = locale;
048  }
049  public Locale getLocale() {
050    return locale;
051  }
052
053  public int getMaxErrors() {
054    return maxErrors;
055  }
056  public void setMaxErrors(int max) {
057    maxErrors = max;
058  }
059
060  public ErrorType createError(String objectName, String errorCode,
061                               String ruleName, String profile,
062                               boolean isFixed, Object... msgArgs)
063  {
064    if (objectName == null) {
065      objectName = "null";
066      logger.warn("Creating an error " + errorCode + " for Null object!");
067    }
068
069    //get/use current behavior
070    Behavior behavior = getRuleBehavior(ruleName, profile);
071    // new error object
072    ErrorType error = new ErrorType(errorCode, behavior);
073
074    // build human-friendly messages using default locale and property files (msg sources)
075    String commonMsg = (messageSource != null)
076      ? messageSource.getMessage(errorCode + ".default", new Object[]{}, "No description.", locale)
077      : "No description.";
078    error.setMessage(commonMsg);
079
080    String msg =
081      (messageSource != null)
082        ? messageSource.getMessage(errorCode, msgArgs, StringUtils.join(msgArgs, "; "), locale)
083            .replaceAll("\r|\n+", " ")
084        : StringUtils.join(msgArgs, "; ");
085
086    // resolve/set BioPAX problem category
087    String category = (messageSource != null)
088      ? messageSource.getMessage(errorCode + ".category", null, Category.INFORMATION.name(), locale)
089      : null;
090    if (category != null)
091      error.setCategory(Category.valueOf(category.trim().toUpperCase()));
092
093    // add one error case
094    ErrorCaseType errorCase = new ErrorCaseType(ruleName, objectName, msg);
095    errorCase.setFixed(isFixed); //
096    error.addErrorCase(errorCase);
097
098    return error;
099  }
100
101  public Behavior getRuleBehavior(String ruleName, String profile) {
102    if (messageSource == null) return Behavior.ERROR;
103
104    //using the default locale for values below (those ain't info messages)
105    final Locale defaultLocale = Locale.getDefault();
106
107    // get the default behavior value first
108    String value = messageSource.getMessage(ruleName + ".behavior", null,
109      "ERROR", defaultLocale);
110
111    // override from the profile
112    if (profile != null && !profile.isEmpty())
113      value = messageSource.getMessage(ruleName + ".behavior." + profile,
114        null, value,  defaultLocale);
115
116    return Behavior.valueOf(value.toUpperCase());
117  }
118
119  public String getRuleDescription(String ruleName) {
120    //the default locale is used to get the ruleName intentionally
121    String tip = messageSource.getMessage(ruleName, null, "", Locale.getDefault());
122    if (tip == null || "".equals(tip)) {
123      tip = "description is not found in the messages.properties file";
124    } else {
125      tip = StringEscapeUtils.escapeHtml4(tip);
126    }
127
128    return tip;
129  }
130
131}
